uniol.apt.util

Class MathTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.util.MathTools

  • public class MathTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Some methods for mathematical calculations like gcd and modulo.
    Author:
    Manuel Gieseking
